data.message: STOP allowing ads with gratuitously graphic images of ill newborns/infants as clickbait to show up on my wall over in the ads section.

replies.message: Hi Wendy. You can remove the posts by selecting the 'x' which appears to the right of the story. For more information, head to: http://bit.ly/2osZ3Fx. -Jessica

It's not a story; I know how to do that. It's in the SPONSORED area on the right of my home page that shows rotating click bait ad garbage of all varieties. I am not going to tolerate having the images I have described popping up. It is an affront.

Facebook likes all that scam stuff cause they act like nothings wrong with it when you report it. They dont even seem to care about that X thing they suggested cause it always pops up. Ive noticed they removed some of the report options for scam pages and just have a "Block this page" option. No wonder why people are limiting their FB use and getting rid of pages that arent friends.
